name: Folder
type: class
memorycategory: Instances
summary: |
  A simple container used to hold and organize Roblox instances.
description: |
  A simple container used to hold and organize Roblox instances. Unlike other
  container classes like Class.Model, a folder generally offers no additional
  functionality. Folders behave the same way as folders in a computer file
  system, meaning they can also be parented to each other.

  #### Usage in UI Hierarchies

  Each Class.Folder in your UI hierarchy can define its own Class.UILayout
  (Class.UIListLayout, Class.UIGridLayout, Class.UIPageLayout,
  Class.UITableLayout), or use a default position-based layout. For example,
  you can set up a Class.Frame with multiple Class.Folder children, each
  with a different Class.UILayout type. Additionally, Class.Folder contents
  are exempt from the effects of a Class.UILayout sibling.
